com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Interface SelectionToolDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LassoTool, MarqueeTool, PerspectiveTool, ProjectionTool, RotateTool, RubberSheetTool, ScaleTool, SlantTool, TransformTool

    public interface SelectionToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering selections drawn by the SelectionTool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPointToSelectionFrame(Point initialPoint, Point newPoint, boolean isShiftKeyDown)
      Invoked to indicate that the user has defined a new point on the selection path.
      void clearSelectionFrame()
      Resets the selection frame such that subsequent calls to getSelectionFrame() return null.
      void closeSelectionFrame(Point finalPoint)
      Invoked to indicate that the given point should be considered the last point in the selection path, and the path shape should be closed.
      Shape getSelectionFrame()
      Gets the current selection frame, or null, if there is no active selection.
      void setSelectionFrame(Shape bounds)
      Creates or replaces the selection frame with the given shape.
      void translateSelectionFrame(int xDelta, int yDelta)
      Translates the location of the current selection frame, if one exists.

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectionFrame

        Shape getSelectionFrame()
        Gets the current selection frame, or null, if there is no active selection.
        Returns:
        The shape of the active selection frame, or null if there is no selection.

      • clearSelectionFrame

        void clearSelectionFrame()
        Resets the selection frame such that subsequent calls to getSelectionFrame() return null.

      • setSelectionFrame

        void setSelectionFrame(Shape bounds)
        Creates or replaces the selection frame with the given shape. Note that tools that do not support arbitrary selection shapes (like the marquee tool) will use the bounds of the given shape instead.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The shape or bounds of the new selection frame.

      • translateSelectionFrame

        void translateSelectionFrame(int xDelta,
                             int yDelta)
        Translates the location of the current selection frame, if one exists.
        Parameters:
        xDelta - The number of pixels to translate in the x-direction
        yDelta - The number of pixels to translate in the y-direction

      • addPointToSelectionFrame

        void addPointToSelectionFrame(Point initialPoint,
                              Point newPoint,
                              boolean isShiftKeyDown)
        Invoked to indicate that the user has defined a new point on the selection path.
        Parameters:
        initialPoint - The first point defined by the user (i.e., where the mouse was initially pressed)
        newPoint - A new point to append to the selection path (i.e., where the mouse is now)
        isShiftKeyDown - When true, indicates user is holding the shift key down

      • closeSelectionFrame

        void closeSelectionFrame(Point finalPoint)
        Invoked to indicate that the given point should be considered the last point in the selection path, and the path shape should be closed.
        Parameters:
        finalPoint - The final point on the selection path.
